titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore child's insurance benefits for postsecondary school students.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 4/7/1987--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to permit full-time postsecondary school students to receive child's insurance benefits on the basis of student status. (Currently, only full-time elementary or secondary school students may receive such benefits on the basis of student status.)
